content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1610721570502{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Website-3-1.png?id=13404) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”padding_right_large:0px|padding_right_medium:40px|padding_right_small:30px”]

Triarii

Triarii is Falanx Cyber’s fully-managed MDR service. Operating around the clock, Triarii hunts for and eradicates threat actors across your environment and endpoints.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1614080738682{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Mobile-Partner-Solarwind-3.png?id=13501) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601027548158{padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

Triarii

Triarii is Falanx Cyber’s fully-managed MDR service. Operating around the clock, Triarii hunts for and eradicates threat actors across your environment and endpoints.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597677709712{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Our Triarii MDR service

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text el_class=”mobile-left”]

Our Triarii MDR service comes with all the tools needed to keep your systems and environment safe from cyber-threats. Here are the features you will get as part of the service.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”35″ ca_init_rotate_x=”0″ ca_init_rotate_y=”0″ ca_init_translate_z=”0″ ca_init_rotate_z=”0″ ca_duration=”1200″ ca_delay=”150″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Security Information and Event Management (SIEM)

Collection, indexing, filtering and alerting of suspicious log activity. We find the needle in the haystack – we sieve through millions of logs to identify what needs investigating, eliminating false negatives and positives.

File Integrity Monitoring (FIM)

Identify unexpected or unapproved activities with files on user devices and servers, stopping the activity before it takes hold of the device / operating system.

Suspicious email analysis

Our analysts investigate emails deemed suspicious by users. By analysing the source and content of such messages we are able to provide an assessment of the threat and recommend actions to be taken.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1600936926114{margin-top: -5px !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:50px|margin_top_small:0px” el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Endpoint Detection & Response (EDR)

Protect your endpoints against a variety of attacks through enhanced monitoring at the device level to spot intrusion earlier and, if appropriate, isolate the device until further investigation reveals next steps remedial action.

Security configuration assessment

Monitor system and application configurations against security policies. Alert you about vulnerable, insecure systems to tighten defences and ensure compliance.

Machine learning

Machine Learning algorithms react to your environment reducing the time for detection of potential malicious activity and rapidly detect threats irrespective of whether behaviour is ‘known’ or ‘unknown’.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1597162264997{padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column]

Full feature list

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1597678123840{padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column width=”1/3″]

24x7x365 service

[vc_column_text]Alerting any time, day or night, including weekends and bank holidays.[/vc_column_text]

Real-time alerting

[vc_column_text]Any time, day or night, weekday, weekend or bank holiday, we will let you know if and when a breach looks to be starting.[/vc_column_text]

Regular reporting

[vc_column_text]Summary reporting of the incidents raised and dealt with over the prior period at both a business and technical level.[/vc_column_text]

Threat hunting

[vc_column_text]Our analysts manually search log data, looking for the signs of intrusion which the automated systems miss.[/vc_column_text]

Surface, deep & dark web monitoring

[vc_column_text]Monitors the deep, dark and surface web for instances of usernames & passwords associated with customer’s domains.[/vc_column_text]

Suspicious email analysis

[vc_column_text]Send questionable emails to our Cyber Security specialists who will investigate and advise as to their threat level / safety.[/vc_column_text]

External IP address monitoring

[vc_column_text]Get ahead of attackers by identifying risk areas in your network and taking remedial action to protect against attack before it happens.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_top_small:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600936978863{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

SIEM

[vc_column_text]Collection, indexing, filtering and alerting of suspicious log activity.[/vc_column_text]

File Integrity Monitoring

[vc_column_text]Monitoring of changes and updates to key files and their attributes.[/vc_column_text]

Endpoint Detection & Response

[vc_column_text]Protect user devices against multiple threat vectors including viruses, malware and file-less attacks. Find out more here.[/vc_column_text]

Intrusion detection system

[vc_column_text]Monitor networks and / or systems for known and sometimes unknown malicious activity and policy violations.[/vc_column_text]

Customer portal access

[vc_column_text]Customers have access to the same data as our SOC Analysts, able to see log events, alerts and analytics first-hand.[/vc_column_text]

Threat intelligence

[vc_column_text]Leverage multiple sources to collate information about threats and threat actors that will help mitigate harmful events.[/vc_column_text]

Data enrichments (e.g. Geo-IP)

[vc_column_text]Leverage trusted external data sources to enrich log data and increase usability / identifiability (e.g. Geographical enhancement of IP addresses to identify source location).[/vc_column_text]

Live data retention

[vc_column_text]Ability to hold data in memory to facilitate near-instant searching.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_top_small:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600936988162{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Security configuration assessments

[vc_column_text]Monitor system and application configurations against security policies.[/vc_column_text]

Log compression at source

[vc_column_text]Reduces the amount of data that needs to be transferred to the SIEM solution.[/vc_column_text]

End to end encryption in transit

[vc_column_text]Encrypts the data prior to being transferred to the SIEM.[/vc_column_text]

End to end guaranteed log delivery

[vc_column_text]Ensures the successful receipt of log data.[/vc_column_text]

Machine learning / artificial intelligence

[vc_column_text]Enhance human curiosity with automated elements to accelerate anomaly identification and remediation.[/vc_column_text]

Centralised log collection policy management

[vc_column_text]Consistent policy management and processes.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597677709712{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Are you heavily invested in the Microsoft Azure platform?

[vc_btn title=”Click here for Triarii for Sentinel” style=”gradient-custom” gradient_custom_color_1=”#122135″ gradient_custom_color_2=”#74b3dc” shape=”square” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ffalanxcyber.com%2Fmanaged-detection-response-triarii-for-sentinel|title:Falanx%20Cyber%E2%80%99s%20Triarii%20for%20Sentinel%20Managed%20Detection%20and%20Response%20Service||”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1598371065231{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/boxes-sectionv2.jpg?id=12014) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Standout service from Falanx cyber security analysts

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

No onboarding fee, no hidden costs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″]

UK Based SOC

All our services are delivered by our approachable and experienced team of cyber specialists working as an extension of your IT team.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″]

Turnkey Service

Simple to roll-out and designed to fit within your existing security processes, our MDR service works across your whole organisation, securing your entire environment.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601388585654{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-about” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
